source_text:
Andrew / CommScope LDF6-50
Model: LDF6-50
Type: cable
1-1/4" HELIAX foam dielectric coaxial cable, aluminum sheath
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 89.0%
Attenuation at 30 MHz: 0.08 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 0.11 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 0.21 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 0.26 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 0.38 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 512 MHz: 0.42 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 806 MHz: 0.53 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 0.56 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 960 MHz: 0.59 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 0.82 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 0.85 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 0.98 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 1-1/4" HELIAX foam dielectric coaxial cable, aluminum sheath
expected_json.notes: Very low loss, heavy and rigid
